definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: pupil of eye (cf. Dl:HA 9 Prät:LoPh, Feb. 1884, but also Ar. 0’insa0nu 0l9ayni, & Nö:ZMG 1886, 739)—´[[א]] all cstr.—[[עַיִן]] ´[[א]] De 32:10, Pr 7:2; [[בַּת־עַיִן]] ´[[א]] Ps 17:8 (in all, sim. of preciousness); = middle, midst of night [[לַיְלָה וַאֲפֵלָה]] ´[[בְּא]] Pr 7:9; [[חשֶׁח]] ´[[בְּא]] Pr 20:20 Kt i.e. in deep darkness (Qr [[בֶּאֱשׁוּן]] v. Now).
